reviewText: Nice little movie.  Not a Huck Finn movie but a kind of a modern day kid that acts a little like Huck so he gets the nickname.
enjoyable addition to our film library
Very poor plot and acting.  Waste of time and money.
this is a great movie i could watch this movie every day i really love it thank you so much
I'm a sucker for any film with Graham Greene.  At this point the film is 20 yrs old and a bit dated.  But dang it!  Graham is still really good in this!
I like Graham Greene so I bought this video. The story is a bit hokey and not very well developed, but it's enjoyable and worth the price.
Great movie.  This is a great adventure story with a good plot and some interesting twists.  Recommended for any 9-13 year olds.
